title: [A Tunneled Approach]
description: A narrow inlet of water trickles into a circular pond that lays eerily still, a watery vortex spinning in its center.  Glowing veins of assorted minerals, rich with ore deposits, line the walls from floor to ceiling.  Pooling on the floor of the cavern is a thick white mist that obscures the surroundings.
tags: meta:mapname:Icemule Trace - The Settlement of Reim
